Container.Name: deepstack
Container.Overview: DeepStack is an AI server that empowers every developer in the world to easily build state-of-the-art AI systems both on premise and in the cloud. The promises of Artificial Intelligence are huge but becoming a machine learning engineer is hard. Build and deploy AI powered applications with in-built and custom AI APIs, all offline and self-hosted. See https://deepstack.cc [br] [br] To use with home assistant see: https://github.com/robmarkcole/HASS-Deepstack-object#hass-deepstack-object [br] [br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']CPUs without AVX[/span][/u][/b] [br] If you are using an older cpu that dosn't support AVX add [b]:noavx[/b] to the end of the [b]"Repository:"[/b] field (switch on advanced view). Should look like this: [b]deepquestai/deepstack:noavx[/b] [br] [br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Nvidia GPU Use[/span][/u][/b] [br] Install Unraid Nvidia Plugin to install Nvidia Drivers. [br] Add [b]:gpu[/b] to the end of the [b]"Repository:"[/b] field (switch on advanced view). Should look like this: [b]deepquestai/deepstack:gpu[/b] [br] Add [b]--runtime=nvidia[/b] is in the [b]"Extra Parameters:"[/b] field (switch on advanced view) [br] Copy your [b]GPU UUID[/b] to [b]NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.[/b]
Container.Description: DeepStack is an AI server that empowers every developer in the world to easily build state-of-the-art AI systems both on premise and in the cloud. The promises of Artificial Intelligence are huge but becoming a machine learning engineer is hard. Build and deploy AI powered applications with in-built and custom AI APIs, all offline and self-hosted. See https://deepstack.cc [br] [br] To use with home assistant see: https://github.com/robmarkcole/HASS-Deepstack-object#hass-deepstack-object [br] [br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']CPUs without AVX[/span][/u][/b] [br] If you are using an older cpu that dosn't support AVX add [b]:noavx[/b] to the end of the [b]"Repository:"[/b] field (switch on advanced view). Should look like this: [b]deepquestai/deepstack:noavx[/b] [br] [br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Nvidia GPU Use[/span][/u][/b] [br] Install Unraid Nvidia Plugin to install Nvidia Drivers. [br] Add [b]:gpu[/b] to the end of the [b]"Repository:"[/b] field (switch on advanced view). Should look like this: [b]deepquestai/deepstack:gpu[/b] [br] Add [b]--runtime=nvidia[/b] is in the [b]"Extra Parameters:"[/b] field (switch on advanced view) [br] Copy your [b]GPU UUID[/b] to [b]NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.[/b]

Config.Name: Webui
Config.Description: For access to the Web UI and API

Config.Name: VISION-DETECTION
Config.Description: This enables the object detection API.

Config.Name: VISION-FACE
Config.Description: This enables the face recognition APIs.

Config.Name: Nvidia Visible Devices
Config.Description: Nvidia Visible Devices (Requires Nvidia GPU and Unraid Nvidia drivers)

Config.Name: Nvidia Driver Capabilities
Config.Description: Nvidia Driver Capabilities (Requires Nvidia GPU and Unraid Nvidia drivers)

Config.Name: Performance Mode
Config.Description: DeepStack offers three modes allowing you to tradeoff speed for performance. You can specify performance mode to be High, Medium and Low.
